title: Ebert & Roeper - 05.04.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  May 4th, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0866439/]Made of Honor[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0845046/]Son of Rambow[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0455805/]Then She Found Me[/url] - (first reviewed last week)
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0371746/]Iron Man[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1012804/]Redbelt[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0896866/]Standard Operating Procedure[/url]

--- Next Week
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0811080/]Speed Racer[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1033643/]What Happens in Vegas[/url]
--- Coming Soon
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0367882/]Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0866439/]Made of Honor[/url]  -  down - down
-- Patrick Dempsey - Michelle Monaghan - Sydney Pollack

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0845046/]Son of Rambow[/url]  -  down - (noble effort) down
-- Neil Dudgeon

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0455805/]Then She Found Me[/url]  -  down - down
-- directed by Helen Hunt
-- Helen Hunt - Colin Firth - Bette Midler - Matthew Broderick

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0371746/]Iron Man[/url]  -  (quick witted & really well acted) up - up
-- Robert Downey Jr. - Terrence Howard - Jeff Bridges - Gwyneth Paltrow

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1012804/]Redbelt[/url]  -  (pulled right in) up - (very strong film) up
-- written & directed by David Mamet - ( House of Games - 
-- Chiwetel Ejiofor - Emily Mortimer - Tim Allen - Ricky Jay - David Paymer - Joe Mantegna

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0896866/]Standard Operating Procedure[/url]  -  (not quite) down - (a movie that must be seen) up
-- documentary directed by Errol Morris - ( The Fog of War - The Thin Blue Line - Gates of Heaven - etc. )

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Phillips:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0368794/]I&#039;m Not There[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Im-Not-There-Christian-Bale/dp/B0013D8L7C/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1210028945&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
		--Roeper:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0412637/]Delirious[/url]  -  2006  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Delirious-Steve-Buscemi/dp/B0013D8L7W/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1210028829&sr=1-2](amazon)[/url]

	---NEW ON VIDEO
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0431308/]P.S. I Love You[/url]  -  down - up
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0785007/]Over Her Dead Body[/url]  -  down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0804492/]The Hottie and the Nottie[/url]  -  (huge thumbs) down - (huge thumbs) down

	---Phillips&#039; Three to See (favorite movies currently in theaters)
		3 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1012804/]Redbelt[/url]
		2 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1047007/]Young @ Heart[/url]
		1 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0371746/]Iron Man[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
Siskel & Ebert and Ebert & Roeper video reviews dating back to 1985 can be found at [url=http://www.atthemoviestv.com/]atthemoviestv.com[/url]
Free [url=http://www.apple.com/podcasting/]Podcasts[/url] of Ebert & Roeper are available at the [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/]iTunes Music Store[/url]
[url=http://www.rogerebert.com]Roger Ebert reviews[/url]
[url=http://www.suntimes.com/index/roeper.html]Richard Roeper columns[/url]
